reviews.text: The staff are very helpful. Platform is clean and well signed. Nice views. Has a carpark with ticket machines.

Newer developments are beautifully in tune with Palladian Bath. They got it right. Bus and railway stations and excellent bicycle parking all right next to each other. A really nice Prezzo here - check for discounts online.
Lovely station, clean, well maintained, easy to access and friendly staff contribute to a happy visit
Nice sunny day to visit Bath Spa.  We did the river tour and it was a lovely experience especially the history behind the place.

Lovely architecture of the building. Nice to see an old looking train station. Unfortunately their timetables are also a bit out of date that leads to people to travel down the tracks by foot like they did last week. GWR didn't have a clue what to do which is typical and consistent with GWR's policy.
We almost joined the trespassers. We heard there was a reasonably priced egg mayonnaise sandwich down the line.
